title: PM-KISAN Enrollment Open
content: Eligible farmers can enroll for direct income support.

title: Tractor Subsidy Window
content: Subsidy for small tractors for registered farmers.

title: Seed Subsidy
content: Discounted certified seeds for farmers in kharif season.

title: Solar Pump Subsidy
content: Apply for solar pump subsidy for irrigation efficiency.

title: Soil Health Campaign
content: Free soil testing camps will be held in select districts.
